content: two ndls parallel to switch to smaller 16 ndl and with b knit for 4 or desired each other one in front and one behind length with a and tapestry needle graft the cowl closed switch to larger 16 ndl and joining a work rnds 1-8 of chart b knit with a knit with b pattern repeat chart a 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 chart b 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 7/19/23 © fairmount fibers ltd 2023 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 3 of 3
